about_the_game:
The fate of the universe is in your hands.... or is it?
The Elders always spoke of a prophesy foretelling the return of Natas, a slumbering evil hellbent on destroying the multiverse as we know it. Has the prophecy been real this whole time or is it just a coincidence that demons have suddenly appeared throughout our small island town of Crest Water?! No matter what you decide to believe, now is the time to rise up and defend our home land!

Adventure into dungeons, collect sweet loot, and defeat various monsters from across the multiverse!
Rift Blade takes the best things from the traditional RPG genre and adds in a little bit of a twist!
Do you have the fortune of Lady Luck or are you adrift in the high seas of random chance?
Each time you play will decide!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 3.20 GHz (or equivalent AMD processor) or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA®GeForce® GTX 650 / 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
